```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)

theme_set(theme_light())

coffee_ratings <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-07-07/coffee_ratings.csv') %>%
  select(-certification_address, -certification_contact)
```


```{r eda}
features <- coffee_ratings %>%
  select(altitude_mean_meters, species, variety, processing_method, aroma:sweetness) %>%
  pivot_longer(aroma:sweetness, names_to = "feature", values_to = "grade")

features %>%
  filter(altitude_mean_meters < 100000) %>%
  ggplot(aes(altitude_mean_meters, grade, colour = feature)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~ feature)
```
